Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: The breakfast area was too small with not enough seats and tables to accommodate guests On Sunday breakfast was absolute chaos There were no coffee cups the kuerig machines weren t working there were no eggs or sausage or seats or milk or silverware and one poor staff person trying to do it all We wouldn t come back to this hotel because they are not prepared to serve breakfast to their guests
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: bathroom is a nightmare for privilege room their most expensive type of room no door for bathroom bad shower toilet is in a separate room a very very tiny room 2sq feet 0 6sqm with no sink A very unfortunate way to design a hotel room
Positive_Review: Staff is helpful and nice Location is very very good close to RER C subway and buses

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Very poorly staffed for breakfast in tiny cramped restaurant 1 person trying to serve 20 guests 45 min waiting time to get clean spoons no warm milk for coffee no one to clear dirty tables hotel should not be offering breakfast if it cannot provide a proper service
Positive_Review: Convenient location 20 min walk from Eiffel Tower next to bus metro and RER stations

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: it is even not 2 stars and breakfast provided bad and staff are rude and the services are horrible The rooms are dirty there is no wifi coverage in rooms the bathroom is not ideal and the fridge is always hot inside They didn t give the wifi password No WIFI in the ROOMS or Restaurant No Parking Space
Positive_Review: The staff working in kitchen was friendly and helpfull but receptions staff was over over over

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: I would re think the breakfast buffet it was OK but I am sure they can do much better
Positive_Review: Helpful staff and quite tolerant had a very crappy problem with the near by car parking they simply had broken payment machines and no one to help out and the hotel staff helped with it Location is very good if you want a point close to most of the famous monuments in Paris

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No English television channels The phone in the room did not work Room service menu was poor
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful Small room but comfortable

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Nothing to compain Did not have breakfast at the hotel though as plenty of choices in the area around
Positive_Review: Located 100 meters away from metro Javel easy access to Paris center Restaurants shops and coffee houses are very nearby on av grenelle River Siene embankment is 50 meters away for good walks and runs Embankment is excellent jogging route to the louvre area and further to notre damme area and back

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: The rooms were too small and congested Our room was not cleared of the glasses bottles etc even till the next night The staff who arranged the airport drop was not honest Gave us a small vehicle after promising and charging for a larger vehicle
Positive_Review: The location was good

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: The toilet was separate from a sink
Positive_Review: The receptioninst staff were very helpful and the hotel was located near a metro station which was good for getting around

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: I stayed in this hotel 19 23 09 2016 4nights I asked the front desk to add my points to loyality account since 1st night and I gave them my loyalty card No and I didn t see that they added it Very Poor breakfast
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Too expensive for what it is This is not a 4 star hotel They have empty minibar only free TV channel with not a single English language channel and no music channels
Positive_Review: Location Staff is good and friendly

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: loud air conditioner
Positive_Review: Attentive and very friendly staff Very clean and the look of the room was pleasant I love the open windows Good food and drink near by

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the bed was comfortable staff were very friendly and so helpful We came as a group on a bike ride from London and they were all set up to store our bikes

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: We asked for a disabled access room the step into the shower is very high there are no grab rails anywhere including in the seperate w c and no slip proof flooring in the shower room the noise of the metro rumbles through the building until late night a little noise from people above and below
Positive_Review: The front of house staff are amazing very friendly helpful and happy nothing is too much room cleaned daily and replenished free safe for valuables good location

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: I was very disappointed with their flexibility to change a reservation date in which I made an error by one day I booked for day of my flight forgetting I would arrive a day later The total number of days would have been the same They would only change if I paid an additional 150 unbelievable And the day manager seemed to think it was funny not at all sorry I would not stay at a Mercure Hotel again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: I can t think of a thing Really
Positive_Review: We were very happy with the Mercure Eiffle Tower It s excellent location is a very short walk to the Juval Station which easily takes you to Versailles or the sites along the Seine The closest bridge has the Statue of Liberty the next one is the Eiffle Tower We took the Batobus a hop on hop off boat along the Seine It took us to most of the major sites There are several nearby affordable good restaurants and the breakfast they offer in the hotel is excellent Our room was spacious with big windows which keep the noise out The bathroom was exceptional In addition their staff was very accommodating and friendly Yes we will stay there again

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Local restaurants a bit limited but many more only a couple of metro stops away
Positive_Review: Excellent access to the Metro and RER a few meters walk Velib bike rack across the street marvellous breakfast with lots of options The staff were superb Easy transfer via RER from CDG airport and a short walk to our Seine river cruise ship

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were more than accommodating They simply could not do enough for us The room was so spacious and even though we had no view of the Eiffel Tower we were looking over The Seine River The room was fabulous and the complimentary drinks in the fridge and the nespresso machine were such nice touches to make our stay even more luxurious

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: We turned air con down because the room was too hot otherwise Cleaning staff turned it back up each day No need to do that Although we hung the towels for re use cleaning staff changed them each day No need to do that either Otherwise nothing to dislike
Positive_Review: Room was large much larger than usual for a Paris hotel at this grade Nicely furnished and quiet Good view over the river Good bathroom Did not have breakfast or drinks in hotel so cannot comment on catering services Reception staff very helpful and friendly Well located easy and interesting to walk round Arrdmts 15 and 16 and 7 Plenty to discover in those three other than Eiffel Tower La Cite de L Architecture in Palais de Chaillot truly excellent especially the currently running World War I exhibition Lots of traditional very good bars bistrots and brasseries in all three Arrdmts Zinc and La Gauloise in 15 and Cafe A La Fontaine in 16 excellent The latter produces its own special raspberry liqueur Metro and RER only 50 metres away at Javel station

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Layout of bathroom facilities in 606 separate toilet and shower room not ideal as no sink in toilet room Also wardrobe opened into the shower room where it would make more sense to have door into main bedroom area
Positive_Review: Clean room location ideal for our trip Staff helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent staff Helped us getting to Disneyland and other locations and made us feel very welcome rooms were very clean looked amazing and modern they even had the English football on even though it was commentated in French so you can t complain

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpfull and serviceminded Great location Only 15min walk from eiffeltower and only 5min walk from a shopping mall Everything was great and again a big star to all the staff that made everything so easy for ur stay

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: Cant find any maybe b fast is a bit overpriced but dats really negligible
Positive_Review: great location 10 15 mins walk from eiffel tower beaugrenelle shopping mall round the corner italian kebab bakery off license next door and javel metro station round the corner Great staff Available 24 7 Very warm helpful luggage n to go around and caring Beautiful room Modern deco very clean spacious well equipped Room 103 Various facilities printing of boarding pass keeping of luggage before check in and after check out Others Clean lobby smell soooo deliciously Christmassy both stairs n lifts Overall Above expectations for a budget hotel keep up the good work

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel about a half block from a Metro station It s also convenient to a grocery store and about three blocks from restaurants The room was very comfortable the staff friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau
Negative_Review: This was supposed to be a romantic anniversary trip I did inform them beforehand requesting for a high level room and or quiet room and or room with outside view We were given non of the requested Upon arrival we were given room 104 on the first floor Our view was pipes We could hear people restaurants throwing trash out and speaking loudly I understand that these requests are based on availability but it seemed like it was the worst room available The air con was inconsistent on the first night it was hot and the next night it was cold despite the same temperature setting You could hear the toilet pipework from the building which was really off putting
Positive_Review: Modern design of the rooms Small rooms but good use of space

Positive_Review: location is perfect near the metro rer river and the eiffel tower the great advantage is that it is near beau grenelle mall so the location has every thing i wanted
